node.title: Looking Up
node.description: This the view from Zion Lodge.  I just couldn't get away from the B&W comp.

node.title: Narrow Falls
node.description:
Narrows of the Virgin River
Zion NP

node.title: Where's Wall Street
node.description: The prime shooting location in the Narrows is called Wall Street. On our 9.4 mile hike of the Virgin River we wondered if we would ever make it. Around this bend in the river we started to see some changes

node.title: Emerald Pools Falls
node.description: Flash floods were not expected when we booked a trip to Zion National Park. The silver lining was being able to see waterfalls that are rarely there. Emerald Pools Falls #1, 2 and 3 are all pictured here. Can you find all three?

node.title: The Watchman
node.description: Like the siren's song....you just have to take this shot.  Classic view of The Watchman at sunset.  Hard to beat it.

node.title: Invitation Pool
node.description: This inviting pool is one of several to greet visitors as they make their way to the Gateway of the Narrows in Zion NP.

node.title: Sunset Slot
node.description: The entrance to slot #1 along the Kanarra Creek Trial.

node.title: The Fire Wave
node.description: With no clouds in the sky at sunset I decided to get a more detailed shot of this incredible formation.  The Fire Wave is certainly the jewel of Valley of Fire State Park.

node.title: Sunset above Emerald Pools
node.description: Taken in Zion National Park along the Emerald Pools Trail
